paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the KCNH2 variant T421M, including clinical significance, penetrance data, and functional studies.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: T421M, a S1 domain mutation in the Kv11.1 channel protein, was identified in a resuscitated patient.

functional_data.summary: The T421M-Kv11.1 mutation caused a loss of IKv11.1 through interactions of abnormal protein trafficking and channel gating.

variants.additional_notes: The study focused on the functional consequences of the T421M variant in vitro.
key_quotes: The T421M-Kv11.1 mutation caused a loss of IKv11.1 through interactions of abnormal protein trafficking and channel gating.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data regarding the KCNH2 variant T421M was successfully extracted.
